Definition.WordDefinition: Warden, LA Zip code(s): 71232 Warden, WA (town, FIPS 76160) Location: 46.96789 N, 119.04699 W Population (1990): 1639 (543 housing units) Area: 3.9 sq km (land), 0.0 sq km (water) Zip code(s): 98857

Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Warden \Ward"en\, n. [OE. wardein, OF. wardein, gardein, gardain, F. gardien. See {Guardian}, and {Ward} guard.] [1913 Webster] 1. A keeper; a guardian; a watchman. [1913 Webster]
He called to the warden on the . . . battlements. --Sir. W. Scott. [1913 Webster]
2. An officer who keeps or guards; a keeper; as, the warden of a prison. [1913 Webster]
3. A head official; as, the warden of a college; specifically (Eccl.), a churchwarden. [1913 Webster]
4. [Properly, a keeping pear.] A large, hard pear, chiefly used for baking and roasting. [Obs.] [1913 Webster]
I would have had him roasted like a warden. --Beau. & Fl. [1913 Webster]
{Warden pie}, a pie made of warden pears. [Obs.] --Shak. [1913 Webster]
warden n : the chief official in charge of a prison [syn: {warder}]
